description:
Meet Masaki, the now former member of the popular NewTuber group, Harikiri Sisters. After a career setback, aka getting fired unexpectedly via a livestream, she joins forces with Live, a partner with superhuman abilities. Together, they aim to create sensational content and reach 1 million subscribers. Will they reach their content dreams or be hit with the block button?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Wilderness
tags.description: Predominantly features a location with little to no human activity, such as a deserted island, a jungle, or a snowy mountain range.

node.description:
Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/raku_tayori) 

He is part of the music group trio tayori, known as Islet prior to isui joining.

__Height:__ 159 cm

__[Profile (Raccoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r12-fai.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fairouzzzzzz) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fairouz_ai/) |  [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ai_Fairouz) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ファイルーズあい)__

Japanese voice actress affiliated with Mausu Promotion (formerly Raccoon Dog).

Fairouz was born to a Japanese mother and an Egyptian father. She was named after the Lebanese singer, Fairuz. She spent a few years of her elementary education in Cairo before returning to Japan. During her junior high school years, she became familiar with the manga series [JoJo's Bizarre Adventure](https://anilist.co/manga/31517/). Due to her growing interest in the series, she would join Skype reading sessions with other fans. Eventually, she was inspired to pursue a career in voice acting, but her parents initially disapproved of her plans. Instead, she would initially study at a graphic design vocational school before spending a year as a dental assistant. Once she was able to save enough money for tuition, she enrolled in a voice acting training school.

In 2019, she debuted as [Hibiki Sakura](https://anilist.co/character/132856/), the protagonist of the anime series [How Heavy Are the Dumbbells You Lift?](https://anilist.co/anime/107226/)

In a Twitter post on 31st December 2024 she announced her indefinite hiatus from voice acting due to health complications surrounding PTSD. On April 1st, she announced she would be returning from hiatus, and that she would be leaving Raccoon Dog for talent agency Mausu Promotion.

__Awards:__
- Best New Actress at the 14th Seiyuu Awards in 2020 for her role as [Hibiki Sakura](https://anilist.co/character/132856/Hibiki-Sakura).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Belorta - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier FA - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ayre - Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon (VG)
- Iono - Pokémon Masters EX (VG)
- Eternity - Reverse 1999 (VG)
- Xilonen - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Catherina Grann - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Aikiyo Fuuka - Blue Archive (VG)

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/yomiya-hina.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hina_Youmiya)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Alice - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Alice: Wonderland Bunny - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Daring Tact - Uma Musume (VG)
- Kala Ideas - Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key (VG) 
- Taoqi - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Hyacine - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__[Website](http://kandajohn.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnkanda_pgr)__

__John Kanda__ is a Japanese composer, guitarist and member of five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093/PENGUIN-RESEARCH)

__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Official Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/ueda-hitomi.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Weeeda_I)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Brid - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- iDoll Flower - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Zani - Wuthering Waves (VG)

**Height:** 153 cm (5'0)

__[Profile (Osawa)](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/kayanoai/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayanoai_0913) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kayanoai_0913/) | [YouTube Channel Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/_kayanomi) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0D6qi-Gr5RW7hqOvTEKmAw)__

__Introduction:__
Ai Kayano is a Japanese voice actress and vocalist currently affiliated with Office Osawa.

__Biography:__
Kayano wanted to work in a job that would involve "healing people", leading to initially take up a course at a vocational school. She worked in the beauty industry and became interested in acting after having seen [Aria](https://anilist.co/anime/477/). While attending school, Kayano continued working in the industry and paid for her tuition.

Kayano began working at Pro-Fit in 2010, voicing two supporting characters in the original video animation [Princess Resurrection](https://anilist.co/anime/9159/). In 2011, she voiced [Meiko "Menma" Honma](https://anilist.co/character/40592/) in [Anohana](https://anilist.co/anime/9989/) and received the Best Rookie Actress award for said role at the 6th Seiyuu Awards. Kayano, [Haruka Tomatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/95890/) and [Saori Hayami](https://anilist.co/staff/95869/) performed the series' ending theme "Secret Base – Kimi ga Kureta Mono (10 years after Ver.)", a cover of a song originally sung by the band Zone.

She is often praised for her vocal range, having voiced a variety of characters such as [Mayaka Ibara](https://anilist.co/character/55137/), [Mashiro Shiina](https://anilist.co/character/61371/), [Darkness](https://anilist.co/character/89363/) and [Akari Kawamoto](https://anilist.co/character/24311/) for example, none of which one would connect to the same voice actress.

**Trivia:**
- Worked part-time at a coffee shop with [Chinatsu Akasaki](https://anilist.co/staff/107652/) before becoming a voice actress.
- She got around 100 suggestions for her nickname in the Anohana radio show, from which she herself picked out Kayanon.

Non-anime roles:
- Atago - Azur Lane
- Graf Zeppelin - Azur Lane
- Kaga - Azur Lane
- Renown - Azur Lane
- Y'shtola Rhul - Final Fantasy XIV

__[Website](http://kandajohn.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnkanda_pgr)__

__John Kanda__ is a Japanese composer, guitarist and member of five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093/PENGUIN-RESEARCH)
